item.title: Test Prep Buying Guide
item.description: üìñ Textbooks Recommended textbook [[notes/resources/kaplan|üìñ Kaplan Series 65 Securities License Exam Manual]] Kaplan‚Äôs textbook and online question bank are designed to work together, and is the resource I most highly recommend as a resource for revision.

item.title: Test Prep Strategy Guide
item.description: Time to Study Topics & Question Weighting Study Order Study vs Revision Resources You‚Äôll want to buy a textbook and question bank to aid in your study. While it‚Äôs possible to fashion your study from free resources, it‚Äôs not recommended as you might be studying outdated information whenever the test is updated with new questions.

item.title: Memorization Cheatsheet
item.description: How I approached memorization when studying for the Series 65 In my final week of studying, I focused largely on the units that had the most questions (Units 1‚Äì7 in [[notes/resources/kaplan|üìñ Kaplan Series 65 Securities License Exam Manual]]), which are related to the [[notes/topics/laws-regulations-guidelines-business-practices|Laws, Regulations, and Guidelines]] topic.

item.title: Accredited Investor
item.description: Accredited Investors include Institutional Investors and individuals who: Earn at least 200,000 USD per year if single; or Earn at least 300,000 USD jointly with a spouse; or Have a net worth of >$1M excluding primary residence (individually or with spouse or partner) Hold a securities license, such as the [[notes/series-65-exam]], which is in good standing ‚Äúin good standing‚Äù here means that the licenseholder‚Äôs license is active (i.

item.title: Kaplan Series 65 Exam Prep
item.description: ![[notes/images/Pasted image 20220729170541.png]] Kaplan‚Äôs Series 65 exam prep comes in multiple pre-bundled packages. The ‚Äúbasic‚Äù package costs US$159.00 (as of time of writing), and should be enough for your self-study needs.

item.title: Laws, Regulations, and Guidelines
item.description: The full title of this topic is ‚ÄúLaws, Regulations, and Guidelines, Including Prohibition on Unethical Business Practices‚Äù

item.title: NASAA Series 65 Exam
item.description: The Series 65 exam ‚Äî the NASAA Investment Advisers Law Examination ‚Äî is a [[notes/concepts/nasaa|NASAA]] exam administered by [[notes/concepts/finra|FINRA]]. The exam consists of 130 scored questions. Candidates have 180 minutes to complete the exam.
